group.sql: SELECT AC.APP_ID, AC.ENAME, AC.REMARK, AC.APP_SYSTEM_CODE, funmanager.LOGIN_NAME AS function_manager, nonfunmanager.LOGIN_NAME AS non_function_manager, funmanager.USERNAME AS function_manager_name, nonfunmanager.USERNAME AS non_function_manager_name, appresgroup.user_grp_name AS app_res_group, appresgroup.user_grp_code AS app_res_group_code, firstresgroup.user_grp_name AS first_res_group, firstresgroup.user_grp_code AS first_res_group_code, AC.IS_NEW, devmanagerA.LOGIN_NAME AS dev_manager_a, devmanagerA.USERNAME AS dev_manager_a_name, devmanagerB.LOGIN_NAME AS dev_manager_b, devmanagerB.USERNAME AS dev_manager_b_name, AC.LOGIC_APP_ID, AC.DEV_UNIT_CODE, AC.APP_MAIN_MANAGE, firstorggroup.org_name AS first_org_group, firstorggroup.org_code AS first_org_group_code, apporggroup.org_name AS app_org_group, apporggroup.org_code AS app_org_group_code, managedept.ins_chn_fullnm AS manage_dept_fullname, managedept.ins_chn_shrtnm AS manage_dept_shortname, businessmanagerA.LOGIN_NAME AS business_user_a, businessmanagerB.LOGIN_NAME AS business_user_b, businessmanagerA.USERNAME AS business_user_a_name, businessmanagerB.USERNAME AS business_user_b_name, datacenterleader.LOGIN_NAME AS data_center_leader, datacenterleader.USERNAME AS data_center_leader_name, devcenterleader.LOGIN_NAME AS dev_center_leader, devcenterleader.USERNAME AS dev_center_leader_name, businesscenterleader.LOGIN_NAME AS business_center_leader, businesscenterleader.USERNAME AS business_center_leader_name, ORG.ORG_NAME AS CI_MGMT_GROUP, TEAM.ORG_NAME AS CI_MG_GROUP, LINE_ORG.ORG_NAME AS LINE_MG_GROUP, AI.APPLY_NAME, AC.APP_SRV_TYPE_CODE, AC.IS_COMBINE, oldAC.COMP_NAME AS OLD_SYSTEM, SOM_FIRST.SOM_FIRST_OPER, SOM_FIRST.SOM_FIRST_OPER_CODE, ICDP.VMIS_INFO, SOM_APP.SOM_APP_OPER, SOM_APP.SOM_APP_OPER_CODE, (CASE AC.IS_ACTIVE WHEN 'Y' THEN '2' WHEN 'N' THEN '4' WHEN 'F' THEN '1' WHEN 'S' THEN '3' ELSE NULL END) SUB_SYSTEM_STATUS FROM APP_COMP AC INNER JOIN S61T1_PHYS_SUB_STM ON S61T1_PHYS_SUB_STM.PHYS_SUB_STM_ID = AC.APP_SYSTEM_CODE AND S61T1_PHYS_SUB_STM.IS_ACTIVE='Y' LEFT JOIN APP_COMP oldAC ON AC.OLD_SYSTEM = oldAC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN LOGIC_APP LA ON AC.LOGIC_APP_ID=LA.LOGIC_APP_ID LEFT JOIN APPLY_INFO AI ON AC.APPLY_ID = AI.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ASRR.APP_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ASRR.ROLE_NAME) AS SOM_APP_OPER, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ASRR.ROLE_ID) AS SOM_APP_OPER_CODE FROM APP_SOM_ROLE_REF ASRR WHERE ASRR.ROLE_TYPE = '1' AND ASRR.IS_DELETE = '0' GROUP BY ASRR.APP_ID ) SOM_APP ON SOM_APP.APP_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ASRR.APP_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ASRR.ROLE_NAME) AS SOM_FIRST_OPER, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ASRR.ROLE_ID) AS SOM_FIRST_OPER_CODE FROM APP_SOM_ROLE_REF ASRR WHERE ASRR.ROLE_TYPE = '2' AND ASRR.IS_DELETE = '0' GROUP BY ASRR.APP_ID ) SOM_FIRST ON SOM_FIRST.APP_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ICDP_VMISINFO ICDP ON AC.APP_SYSTEM_CODE = ICDP.APP_SYS_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.LOGIN_NAME) LOGIN_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USERNAME) USERNAME, r.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_ROLE_REL r, PORTAL_ROLE_USER_REL re, PORTAL_USER u WHERE r.ROLE_TYPE = 'DA' AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND re.IS_DELETE = 0 AND u.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.ROLE_ID = re.ROLE_ID AND u.USER_ID = re.USER_ID GROUP BY r.RES_ID ) devmanagerA ON devmanagerA.RES_ID=AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.LOGIN_NAME) LOGIN_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USERNAME) USERNAME, r.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_ROLE_REL r, PORTAL_ROLE_USER_REL re, PORTAL_USER u WHERE r.ROLE_TYPE = 'DB' AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND re.IS_DELETE = 0 AND u.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.ROLE_ID = re.ROLE_ID AND u.USER_ID = re.USER_ID GROUP BY r.RES_ID ) devmanagerB ON devmanagerB.RES_ID=AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.LOGIN_NAME) LOGIN_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USERNAME) USERNAME, r.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_ROLE_REL r, PORTAL_ROLE_USER_REL re, PORTAL_USER u WHERE r.ROLE_TYPE = 'FTMA' AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND re.IS_DELETE = 0 AND u.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.ROLE_ID = re.ROLE_ID AND u.USER_ID = re.USER_ID GROUP BY r.RES_ID ) funmanager ON funmanager.RES_ID=AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.LOGIN_NAME) LOGIN_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USERNAME) USERNAME, r.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_ROLE_REL r, PORTAL_ROLE_USER_REL re, PORTAL_USER u WHERE r.ROLE_TYPE = 'NFTMA' AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND re.IS_DELETE = 0 AND u.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.ROLE_ID = re.ROLE_ID AND u.USER_ID = re.USER_ID GROUP BY r.RES_ID ) nonfunmanager ON nonfunmanager.RES_ID=AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USER_GRP_NAME) user_grp_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USER_GRP_ID) user_grp_code, t.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_GROUP_REF t LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_USER_GROUP u on u.USER_GRP_ID=t.USER_GROUP_ID WHERE t.GROUP_TYPE_CODE = 'EG' AND t.IS_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY t.RES_ID ) appresgroup ON appresgroup.RES_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USER_GRP_NAME) user_grp_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USER_GRP_ID) user_grp_code, t.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_GROUP_REF t LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_USER_GROUP u on u.USER_GRP_ID=t.USER_GROUP_ID WHERE t.GROUP_TYPE_CODE = 'SG' AND t.IS_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY t.RES_ID ) firstresgroup ON firstresgroup.RES_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ORG_NAME) org_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ORG_CODE) org_code, RES_ID FROM ( SELECT u.ORG_NAME, t.RES_ID, u.ORG_CODE FROM CM_RES_ORG_REF t LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_ORG u on u.ORG_ID=t.ORG_ID WHERE t.ORG_TYPE_CODE = 'AG' AND t.IS_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY t.RES_ID, u.ORG_NAME ) A GROUP BY RES_ID ) apporggroup ON apporggroup.RES_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ORG_NAME) org_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ORG_CODE) org_code, RES_ID FROM ( SELECT u.ORG_NAME, t.RES_ID, u.ORG_CODE FROM CM_RES_ORG_REF t LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_ORG u on u.ORG_ID=t.ORG_ID WHERE t.ORG_TYPE_CODE = 'LG' AND t.IS_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY t.RES_ID, u.ORG_NAME ) A GROUP BY RES_ID ) firstorggroup ON firstorggroup.RES_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.INS_CHN_FULLNM) ins_chn_fullnm, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.INS_CHN_SHRTNM) ins_chn_shrtnm, t.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_ORG_REF t INNER JOIN PORTAL_CCBINS u on u.INS_ID=t.ORG_ID WHERE t.ORG_TYPE_CODE = 'MA' AND t.IS_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY t.RES_ID ) managedept ON managedept.RES_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.LOGIN_NAME) LOGIN_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USERNAME) USERNAME, r.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_ROLE_REL r, PORTAL_ROLE_USER_REL re, PORTAL_USER u WHERE r.ROLE_TYPE = 'BA' AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND re.IS_DELETE = 0 AND u.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.ROLE_ID = re.ROLE_ID AND u.USER_ID = re.USER_ID GROUP BY r.RES_ID ) businessmanagerA ON businessmanagerA.RES_ID=AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.LOGIN_NAME) LOGIN_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USERNAME) USERNAME, r.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_ROLE_REL r, PORTAL_ROLE_USER_REL re, PORTAL_USER u WHERE r.ROLE_TYPE = 'BB' AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND re.IS_DELETE = 0 AND u.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.ROLE_ID = re.ROLE_ID AND u.USER_ID = re.USER_ID GROUP BY r.RES_ID ) businessmanagerB ON businessmanagerB.RES_ID=AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.LOGIN_NAME) LOGIN_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USERNAME) USERNAME, r.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_ROLE_REL r, PORTAL_ROLE_USER_REL re, PORTAL_USER u WHERE r.ROLE_TYPE = 'DCM' AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND re.IS_DELETE = 0 AND u.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.ROLE_ID = re.ROLE_ID AND u.USER_ID = re.USER_ID GROUP BY r.RES_ID ) datacenterleader ON datacenterleader.RES_ID=AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.LOGIN_NAME) LOGIN_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USERNAME) USERNAME, r.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_ROLE_REL r, PORTAL_ROLE_USER_REL re, PORTAL_USER u WHERE r.ROLE_TYPE = 'DEM' AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND re.IS_DELETE = 0 AND u.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.ROLE_ID = re.ROLE_ID AND u.USER_ID = re.USER_ID GROUP BY r.RES_ID ) devcenterleader ON devcenterleader.RES_ID=AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.LOGIN_NAME) LOGIN_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.USERNAME) USERNAME, r.RES_ID FROM CM_RES_ROLE_REL r, PORTAL_ROLE_USER_REL re, PORTAL_USER u WHERE r.ROLE_TYPE = 'BSM' AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND re.IS_DELETE = 0 AND u.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.ROLE_ID = re.ROLE_ID AND u.USER_ID = re.USER_ID GROUP BY r.RES_ID ) businesscenterleader ON businesscenterleader.RES_ID=AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT r.RES_ID, r.uyun_update_time as res_role_time, re.uyun_update_time as portal_role_user_time, u.uyun_update_time as portal_user_time FROM CM_RES_ROLE_REL r, PORTAL_ROLE_USER_REL re, PORTAL_USER u WHERE r.ROLE_TYPE IN ('AA','AB','LA','LB','DA','DB','FTMA','NFTMA') AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND re.IS_DELETE = 0 AND u.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.ROLE_ID = re.ROLE_ID AND u.USER_ID = re.USER_ID GROUP BY r.RES_ID ) managertime ON managertime.RES_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.RES_ID, t.uyun_update_time as res_group_time, u.uyun_update_time as v_portal_user_group_time FROM CM_RES_GROUP_REF t LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_USER_GROUP u ON u.USER_GRP_ID = t.USER_GROUP_ID WHERE t.GROUP_TYPE_CODE IN ('EG','SG') AND t.IS_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY t.RES_ID ) resgrouptime ON resgrouptime.RES_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.RES_ID, t.uyun_update_time as res_group_time, u.uyun_update_time as v_portal_user_group_time FROM CM_RES_USERGROUP_REF t LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_USER_GROUP u ON u.USER_GRP_ID = t.USERGROUP_ID WHERE t.USERGROUP_TYPE_CODE IN ('AG','LG') AND t.IS_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY t.RES_ID ) usergrouptime ON usergrouptime.RES_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_ORG ORG ON AC.ORG_ID=ORG.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_ORG TEAM ON ORG.PARENT_ORG_ID=TEAM.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_ORG LORG ON AC.LINE_ORG_ID=LORG.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_ORG LINE_ORG ON LINE_ORG.ORG_ID=LORG.PARENT_ORG_ID WHERE ISNULL( AC.APP_SYSTEM_CODE ) = 0 AND LENGTH( trim( AC.APP_SYSTEM_CODE ) ) > 0 ORDER BY AC.APP_ID

SELECT PHYS_SUB_STM_ENGSHTNM, LGC_SUB_STM_ID, LGC_SUB_STM_CHNFLNM, LGC_SUB_STM_ENGSHTNM, PHYS_SUB_STM_ID, PHYS_SUB_STM_CHN_NM, PHYS_SUB_STM_ENGSHTNM, STM_LVL, RTO, RPO, STM_OPRT_TM, PHYS_SUB_STM_FRAME, DPY_MOD, PHYS_SUB_STM_STAT, PHYS_SUB_STM_MOD, DVLP_DEPT_NM, DVLP_DEPT_ID, DVLP_DEPT_CTCPSN_ID, DVLP_DEPT_CTCPSN_NM, DVLP_DEPT_CTCPSN_TEL, IS_ACTIVE, SUB_SYSTEM_REGION, SUB_STM_STACK, FRT_LEADER_PSN_ID, FRT_LEADER_PSN_NM, FRT_LEADER_PSN_UASS, OVERSEAS_AP_DEPLOY, OVERSEAS_DB_INSTANCE, PRJ_APP_TYPE, PHYS_SUB_STM_IMPACT_AREA, OFF_LINE_DT, PHYS_SUB_STM_SORT FROM `S61T1_PHYS_SUB_STM_temp` where IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT PHYSYS_DATA.app_sys_code, `app_id`, `app_manage_dept`, `app_manage_dept_code`, `app_manager_a`, `app_manager_a_name`, `app_manager_b`, `app_manager_b_name`, `app_ops_org`, `app_ops_org_code`, `app_ops_user_group`, `app_ops_user_group_code`, `area`, `business_tag`, `business_type`, `deploy_platform`, `desc`, `dev_support_user_group`, `dev_support_user_group_code`, `disaster_recovery_status`, `external_sys_info`, `first_ops_dept`, `first_ops_dept_code`, `first_ops_post`, `first_ops_post_code`, `first_ops_user_group`, `first_ops_user_group_code`, `group_or_ccb`, `is_first_ops`, `operation_manager_a`, `operation_manager_a_name`, `operation_manager_b`, `operation_manager_b_name`, `production_time`, `recent_maintainer`, `recent_maintenance_time`, `sub_system_op_ways`, `system_create_time` FROM PHYSYS_DATA WHERE PHYSYS_DATA.is_delete = 0

select logic.LOGIC_APP_CODE, logic.LOGIC_SYS_TYPE, logic.LOGIC_SYS_LAYER, logic.LOGIC_SYS_PLATFORM_FRAME, logic.LOGIC_SYS_DEVELOPMENT, logic.DEVELOPER_NAME, logic.DEVELOPER_UASS, logic.LOGIC_SYS_DEPLOY_TYPE, logic.LOGIC_SYS_FUNCTION_DESC, logic.EN_SHORT_NAME, logic.LOGIC_APP_CNAME, logic.LOGIC_APP_ENAME, logic.LOGIC_APP_ENAME, logic.LOGIC_APP_STATUS, logic.IS_ACTIVE from LOGICSYSTEM logic order by logic.LOGIC_APP_CODE

SELECT entry.ENTERPRISE_PROJECT_CODE, entry.ENTERPRISE_PROJECT_NAME, entry.BUSINESS_SECTOR, entry.BUSINESS_LEADING_DEPT, entry.DEVELOP_LEADING_DEPT, entry.PROJECT_MANAGER, entry.PROJECT_MANAGER_UASS, entry.TEAM_MEMBERS, entry.LOGIC_SYS_INFO, entry.IS_ACTIVE FROM ENTERPRISEPROJECT entry order by entry.ENTERPRISE_PROJECT_CODE
SELECT * from ads_pdb_temp
SELECT * from ads_cdb_temp

SELECT DU.DU_NAME, DU.DU_ID, DU.APP_ID, DU.DU_TYPE_CODE, DU.CNAME, DU.IS_NEW, DU.DATACENTER_ID, DU.PLATFORM_TYPE_CODE, DU.DU_STATUS_CODE, DU.SOFTWARE_OS_ID, DU.SOFTWARE_OS_TYPE, DU.ENATTR, DU.REMARK, DU.IS_ACTIVE, DU.P_TYPE_CODE, DU.SECURE_AREA_CODE, DU.SECURE_NODE, DU.SERVICE_TYPE_CODE, DU.SECURE_TIER_CODE, DU.HA_TYPE_CODE, RD.DATACENTER_NAME, PORTAL.ORG_NAME MAINTEIN_ORG, PORTAL2.ORG_NAME MAINTEIN_DEPT, PORTAL3.ORG_NAME MAINTEIN_GROUP, AC.APP_SYSTEM_CODE, AC.CNAME APP_SYSTEM_CNAME, CSS.SERVICE_SET_NAME, CSS.CPU, CSS.MEM FROM APP_DU DU INNER JOIN APP_COMP AC ON DU.APP_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN CLOUD_SERVICE_SET CSS ON DU.SERVICE_SET_ID = CSS.SERVICE_SET_ID LEFT JOIN RM_DATACENTER RD ON RD.DATACENTER_ID = DU.DATACENTER_ID LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_ORG PORTAL ON DU.MAINTEIN_ORG_ID = PORTAL.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_ORG PORTAL2 ON DU.MAINTEIN_DEPT_ID = PORTAL2.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN V_PORTAL_ORG PORTAL3 ON DU.MAINTEIN_GROUP_ID = PORTAL3.ORG_ID WHERE DU.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY DU.DU_ID, DU.LAST_UPDATE_TIME
select t.* from ads_linux_temp as t where t.is_active = 'Y'

SELECT `NAME`, `IP`,
`LOGICAL_STATUS`, `DU_ID`, `REL_DATACENTER` DATACENTER_NAME, `VERSION_INFO`, `CPULOGICALNUM`, `DEVICE_STATUS_CODE`, `MEMORY`, `IS_ACTIVE` FROM CLOUD_DEVICE_LINUX

SELECT NAME, IP, IP_LIST, LOGICAL_STATUS, DU_ID, REL_DATACENTER, VERSION_INFO, CPULOGICALNUM, DEVICE_STATUS_CODE, IS_ACTIVE, MEMORY
FROM CLOUD_DEVICE_HPUX ORDER BY DEVICE_ID

SELECT `NAME`, `IP`,
`LOGICAL_STATUS`, `DU_ID`, `REL_DATACENTER`, `VERSION_INFO`, `CPULOGICALNUM`, `DEVICE_STATUS_CODE`, `IS_ACTIVE`, `MEMORY` FROM CLOUD_DEVICE_WINDOWS ORDER BY DEVICE_ID

SELECT `NAME`, `IP`, `IP_LIST`, `LOGICAL_STATUS`, `DU_ID`, `REL_DATACENTER`, `VERSION_INFO`, `CPULOGICALNUM`, `DEVICE_STATUS_CODE`, `IS_ACTIVE`, `MEMORY`
FROM CLOUD_DEVICE_AIX ORDER BY DEVICE_ID
select t.* from ads_bms_temp as t where t.is_active = 'Y'

SELECT `NAME`, `IP`, `LOGICAL_STATUS`, `DEPLOY_UNIT`, `DU_NAME`, `DU_TYPE_CODE`, `DU_ID`, `COMP_ENAME`, `COMP_CNAME`, `REL_DATACENTER` DATACENTER_NAME, `CLUSTER_NAME`, `CDP_NAME`, `CDP_ID`, `RES_POOL_NAME`, `VM_TYPE`, `VIRTUAL_TYPE`, `SERIAL_NUMBER`, `HOST_MACHINE_SN`, `HOST_MACHINE_NAME`, `OS_TYPE`, `OS_IP`, `STORAGE_SIZE`, `MEMORY_CAPACITY`, `CPU_CORES`, `MANAGER_STATUS_CODE`, `REMARK`, `DEVICE_STATUS_CODE`, `IS_ACTIVE`, `HOST_MACHINE_ID`, `DEVICE_ID` FROM CLOUD_DEVICE_VM ORDER BY DEVICE_ID

select t.cpu_cores, t.datacenter, t.datacenter_abbr, t.device_id, t.device_status_code, t.du_id, t.ip, t.ip_list, t.is_active, t.is_poweron, t.manage_account, t.memory_capacity, t.name, t.os, t.os_ip, t.os_type, t.rel_datacenter, t.storage_size, t.uuid, t.vm_type, t.deploy_unit from ads_vm_temp as t where t.is_active = 'Y'

SELECT CAMR.CMDB_ASSET_CLASS_CODE CLASSCODE, CPMS.SERIAL_NUMBER, CPMS.CARD_NUMBER, CPMS.DEVICE_TYPE, CPMS.DEVICE_TYPE_NUMBER, CPMS.DEVICE_MODEL, CPMS.DEVICE_MODEL_NUMBER, CPMS.DEVICE_VENDOR, CPMS.DEVICE_ORIGIN, CPMS.DEVICE_ORIGIN_DESCRIPTION, CPMS.CONFIG_DESCRIPTION, CPMS.BUSINESS_STATUS, CPMS.PHYSICAL_STATUS, CPMS.IS_MAIN_DEVICE, CPMS.MAIN_DEVICE_SERIAL_NUMBER, CPMS.IS_ACTIVE, CPMS.BUDGET_APPROVAL_NUMBER, CPMS.CONTRACT_NAME, CPMS.CONTRACT_NUMBER, CPMS.CONTRACT_ITEM_NUMBER, CPMS.INTEGRATOR, CPMS.INTEGRATOR_NUMBER, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_CONTRACT_NUMBER, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_PROVIDER, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_START_TIME, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_END_TIME, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_STATUS, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_SERVICE_TYPE, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_SERVICE_LEVEL, CPMS.SCRAP_TIME, CPMS.RESPONSIBILITY_CENTER, CPMS.RESPONSIBILITY_CENTER_NUMBER, CPMS.RESPONSIBILITY_DEPT, CPMS.RESPONSIBILITY_DEPT_NUMBER, CPMS.PERSON_LIABLE, CPMS.PERSON_LIABLE_NUMBER, CPMS.MANAGEMENT_UNIT, CPMS.MANAGEMENT_DEPT, CPMS.ADMINISTRATOR, CPMS.ADMINISTRATOR_NUMBER, CPMS.VOLTAGE, CPMS.ELECTRIC_CURRENT, CPMS.DEVICE_POWER, CPMS.DEVICE_WEIGHT, CPMS.U_HEIGHT, CPMS.POWER_CONNECTION, CPMS.POWER_SUPPLY_MODE, CPMS.INSTALL_TYPE, CPMS.POWER_NUMBERS, CPMS.INSTALL_MODE, CPMS.OPTICAL_PORTS, CPMS.ELECTRIC_PORTS, CPMS.STOCK_LOCATION, CPMS.WAREHOUSE_NAME, CPMS.WAREHOUSE_NUMBER, CPMS.WAREHOUSE_STORAGE_LOCATION, CPMS.WAREHOUSE_STORAGE_LOCATION_NUMBER, CPMS.ARRIVAL_TIME, CPMS.POWER_ON_ACCEPT_TIME, CPMS.FRAME_CONFIG_NUMBER FROM `NCPMS_CM_NETWORK_DEVICE` CPMS INNER JOIN `cmdb_asset_mapping_rule` CAMR ON CPMS.DEVICE_TYPE = CAMR.asset_device_type_name WHERE DEVICE_TYPE in ('核心交换机','高端交换机','中端交换机','低端交换机')
SELECT t.en_short_name,t.net_sys_code,t.cname,t.is_active,t.owner_number,t.owner_name FROM SDWAN_NET_SUB_SYS t

SELECT CAMR.CMDB_ASSET_CLASS_CODE CLASSCODE, CPMS.SERIAL_NUMBER, CPMS.CARD_NUMBER, CPMS.DEVICE_TYPE, CPMS.DEVICE_TYPE_NUMBER, CPMS.DEVICE_MODEL, CPMS.DEVICE_MODEL_NUMBER, CPMS.DEVICE_VENDOR, CPMS.DEVICE_ORIGIN, CPMS.DEVICE_ORIGIN_DESCRIPTION, CPMS.CONFIG_DESCRIPTION, CPMS.BUSINESS_STATUS, CPMS.PHYSICAL_STATUS, CPMS.IS_MAIN_DEVICE, CPMS.MAIN_DEVICE_SERIAL_NUMBER, CPMS.IS_ACTIVE, CPMS.BUDGET_APPROVAL_NUMBER, CPMS.CONTRACT_NAME, CPMS.CONTRACT_NUMBER, CPMS.CONTRACT_ITEM_NUMBER, CPMS.INTEGRATOR, CPMS.INTEGRATOR_NUMBER, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_CONTRACT_NUMBER, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_PROVIDER, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_START_TIME, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_END_TIME, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_STATUS, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_SERVICE_TYPE, CPMS.MAINTENANCE_SERVICE_LEVEL, CPMS.SCRAP_TIME, CPMS.RESPONSIBILITY_CENTER, CPMS.RESPONSIBILITY_CENTER_NUMBER, CPMS.RESPONSIBILITY_DEPT, CPMS.RESPONSIBILITY_DEPT_NUMBER, CPMS.PERSON_LIABLE, CPMS.PERSON_LIABLE_NUMBER, CPMS.MANAGEMENT_UNIT, CPMS.MANAGEMENT_DEPT, CPMS.ADMINISTRATOR, CPMS.ADMINISTRATOR_NUMBER, CPMS.VOLTAGE, CPMS.ELECTRIC_CURRENT, CPMS.DEVICE_POWER, CPMS.DEVICE_WEIGHT, CPMS.U_HEIGHT, CPMS.POWER_CONNECTION, CPMS.POWER_SUPPLY_MODE, CPMS.INSTALL_TYPE, CPMS.POWER_NUMBERS, CPMS.INSTALL_MODE, CPMS.OPTICAL_PORTS, CPMS.ELECTRIC_PORTS, CPMS.STOCK_LOCATION, CPMS.WAREHOUSE_NAME, CPMS.WAREHOUSE_NUMBER, CPMS.WAREHOUSE_STORAGE_LOCATION, CPMS.WAREHOUSE_STORAGE_LOCATION_NUMBER, CPMS.ARRIVAL_TIME, CPMS.POWER_ON_ACCEPT_TIME, CPMS.FRAME_CONFIG_NUMBER FROM `NCPMS_CM_NETWORK_DEVICE` CPMS INNER JOIN `cmdb_asset_mapping_rule` CAMR ON CPMS.DEVICE_TYPE = CAMR.asset_device_type_name WHERE DEVICE_TYPE in ('低端防火墙','中端防火墙','高端防火墙')

SELECT EC.CABINET_ID, EC.CABINET_CODE, EC.CABINET_TYPE_ID, EC.CABINET_SN, EC.APP_U, EC.PLAN_U, EC.PLAN_U-EC.APP_U AS CAN_BE_USED, EC.PLAN_WEIGHT, EC.REMARK, X.TYPE_NAME, X.DICNAME, EC.ROOM_ID, '' AS SSWLQY, '' AS JGDYDDBH, '' AS DYCTSYSL, EC.IS_ACTIVE, EC.CABINET_ADAPTER_TYPE, EC.CABINET_USAGE_TYPE FROM EM_CABINET EC LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.TYPE_NAME AS TYPE_NAME, B.SEQ_TYPE_ID AS SEQ_TYPE_ID, D.TYPE_NAME AS P_TYPE_NAME, K.DICNAME AS DICNAME, B.uyun_update_time AS CI_TYPE_TIME, C.uyun_update_time AS PRODMENU_TIME, K.uyun_update_time AS DIC_TIME FROM CM_CI_TYPE B LEFT JOIN CM_CI_PRODMENU C ON B.SEQ_TYPE_ID = C.CI_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN CM_CI_TYPE D ON B.TYPE_PARENT_ID = D.SEQ_TYPE_ID AND B.LEVEL_FLAG = 2 AND D.LEVEL_FLAG = 0 LEFT JOIN ADMIN_DIC K ON BINARY C.COMP_CODE = K.DIC_CODE AND K.DIC_TYPE_CODE = 'CM_CI_COMPANY' ) X ON EC.CABINET_TYPE_ID = X.SEQ_TYPE_ID ORDER BY EC.CABINET_ID
SELECT ED.ROOM_ID, ED.ROOM_CODE, ED.DCBUILD_ID, EDB.DATACENTER_ID, ED.IS_ACTIVE FROM EM_DCROOM ED LEFT JOIN EM_DCBUILDING EDB ON ED.DCBUILD_ID = EDB.BDG_ID ORDER BY ED.ROOM_ID
SELECT ED.BDG_ID, ED.BDG_NAME, ED.DATACENTER_ID, ED.IS_ACTIVE FROM EM_DCBUILDING ED ORDER BY ED.BDG_ID

SELECT RD.DATACENTER_ID, RD.DATACENTER_NAME, RD.DATACENTER_ENAME, RD.ADDRESS_CODE, RD.DATACENTER_ABBR, RD.DATACENTER_TYPE_CODE, RD.REMARK, RD.PDC_ID, RD.IS_ACTIVE FROM RM_DATACENTER RD ORDER BY RD.DATACENTER_ID
